name: Dawn Of The Rise Of The Silhouette Puppet Fights In Asia: The Reckoning
name_original: Dawn Of The Rise Of The Silhouette Puppet Fights In Asia: The Reckoning
description:
You are the last samurai in feudal Japan, and you must alone fight against the invading forces of the evil space Shogun who is trying to enslave your people!

CONTROLS:

  •  A/D - Move left/right
  • W - Jump
  • Space - Slash thine enemies
